data.title: Read for Good's hospital programme gives books and stories to children's hospitals.
data.meta_description: Throughout the year, Read for Good provides brand new books and storyteller visits to brighten up the days of children in hospitals across the UK.
data.text:
“The more comfortable our patients, the less anxious our visiting families. The less anxious our visiting families, the more time staff have to carry out other duties.

Happier children attending operating theatres will spend less time in the anaesthetic room and will then wake up relaxed in recovery.

Read for Good has a significant impact throughout the hospital and throughout a patient’s journey from admission to discharge.”
